sources.title: The Fragile King | Full 2025 Hollywood Drama Movie | Award Winning Full Movie
sources.description:
After the tragic death of his mother in a car accident, 15-year-old Michael King is sent to live with his grandfather Gerald, whom he hardly knows. The emotional gulf between the traumatized boy and cantankerous old man is immense, but during a road trip across South Africa's Northern Cape to reunite Michael with his estranged father, a relationship of understanding and trust slowly emerges.

2025.  Stars: Andrew Buckland, Alex de la Rey, Deon Lotz
Licensed from MVD. All rights reserved

metadata.Plot: Gerald King, who is closer to death than life gets dumped with his 15 -year-old grandson, when the child's mother dies in a drunken car crash. Both the boy and grandfather are shocked into a new reality.
metadata.Actors: Andrew Buckland, Alex de la Rey, Deon Lotz
